dcterms:description: The dataset comprises eight primary modes of transportation, including Still, Walk, Run, Bike, Car, Bus, Train, and Subway. It was collected by three users with smartphones at four distinct positions, including the hand, hips, torso, and bag. The dataset contains 753 hours of locomotion data, recorded measurements from various sensors, and is appropriately labeled.
dcterms:title: 2018 Sussex-Huawei Locomotion (SHL) challenge dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Gjoreski

S. Mekki

D. Roggen
dcterms:description: A subset of the SHL dataset specifically designated for the SHL challenge 2018, utilized for training and testing purposes in transportation mode detection tasks.
dcterms:title: SHL challenge 2018 (subset of the SHL dataset)
